Intent (what it represents): The agreement that governs the sharing. Scope/root of an instance.
An organisation or unit that participates.
The role a party plays in sharing.
A concrete processing step under the DSA.
Machine-readable allow/deny clauses for use and onward sharing.
Who can access what, under which conditions.

Key alignments: (no direct DPV class; use dpv:Recipient, dpv:Location)

Intent (what it represents): How data-subject rights are fulfilled and by whom.
Who maintains quality and how corrections propagate.
